metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29447 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: Wordpress is an open source CMS. A user with the ability to upload files(like an Author) can exploit an XML parsing issue in the Media Libraryleading to XXE attacks. This requires WordPress installation to be usingPHP 8. Access to internal files is possible in a successful XXE attack.This has been patched in WordPress version 5.7.1, along with the olderaffected versions via a minor release. We strongly recommend you keepauto-updates enabled.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
